summary: Hardware replay capture was skipped because the Codex sandbox cannot provision the crown replay toolchain (dockerized codecs, SoX, FFmpeg) or reach gate-runner-02 to stream audio/video instrumentation.

notes: Replay scenarios require the crown audio/video codecs installed on gate-runner hardware; these binaries are absent from the sandbox container.
Without outbound network access or docker privileges the sandbox cannot attach to gate-runner-02 or pull the rehearsal images, so the hardware validation remains pending.
